title: The Blurred Man: An Aberration Story
description: He's lived on Earth for centuries ... but is he friend or foe?FBI agent Dylan Plumm's investigation puts her on the trail of the Blurred Man, a mysterious individual who may have been on Earth for hundreds of years. The case turns deadlier at every turn, placing Dylan in the cross-hairs of shadowy antagonists even as she unravels a centuries-old mystery. But when Dylan comes face-to-face with the Blurred Man, will he be an ally â€¦or her deadliest foe?Author's note: This story is part of the Prometheus Saga, an experimental anthology featuring a single character whose life spans centuries as an observer of Earth and mankind.
author: Lewis Knight
